articles.title: Texas Democrats leave the state to prevent vote on GOP-drawn congressional map
articles.content: States typically redraw congressional district boundaries once every 10 years following the release of updated population data from the United States census. Two-thirds of the Texas House is required for a quorum, the minimum amount...

articles.title: How Pamela Anderson and Liam Neeson's 'Very Grounded' Relationship Blossomed (Exclusive Source)
articles.content: Pamela Anderson and Liam Neeson are enjoying a quiet, low-key connection thatâ€™s built on mutual respect and shared values. â€œPam and Liam really enjoy each otherâ€™s company. Theyâ€™re taking things slow and itâ€™s actually very grounded,â€ a source exclusively tells PEOPLE. â€œThe relationship blossomed out of a mutual appreciation for the simpler things in life. Theyâ€™ve bonded over their shared love of nature, classic films and a slower pace. Neither of them are chasing the spotlight and they value their privacy at this point in their life.â€. Anderson, 58, has been living a more stripped-down, natural lifestyle for the past few years. â€œI just thought, â€˜Iâ€™m doing this for all the girls out there.â€™â€

articles.title: Safeguards in place to deter fraudulent injury claims at workplace: MOM
articles.content: On average, 28,500 WIC claims are made each year, of which around 26,800 are paid out, the ministry said. MOM said that there are three safeguards in place, which separately come under the purview...
